job.title: Data Scientist - Part time
job.description: pWishi is transforming the retail experience as we know itand we want your big ideas ppAt Wishi our goal is to help our customers look great and feel great about themselves by revolutionizing how people shop and use their closets In a timestarved world where online shopping often feels overwhelming our business connects customers to outfits they love Whether its helping someone dress for success at a new job or taking the stress out of packing for a family vacation we take care of our clients  and they love us for it ppbr ppWe are looking for someone who identifies as a numbers person cares about using data to drive critical business decisions and will actively promote a datadriven approach to decision making in Wishi pbrpWhat you will do pbrullipDevelop endtoend data science projects from data collection cleaning and preprocessing of structured and unstructured data to live models in production plilipTranslate business challenges into datadriven solutions plilipDesigning experiments to measure the impact of new features on our service plilipEvaluate consumer behavior including customer journeys site traffic and marketing funnels identify characteristic patterns predict churn likelihood attribute signuppurchase to the right channels and reduce uncertainties that come with the service business plilipAnalyze customer acquisition strategies in digital media including Social SearchVideoOTT Display etc to maximize Return on Advertising Spend ROAS plilipPartner with the Product to identify key customer personas and measure Lifetime Value  Customer Acquisition Cost LTVCAC per marketing channel plilipQuantify impact of content social and earned media on purchase intent plilipCollaborate with product design and engineering to develop an understanding of needs plilipCreate usable KPI dashboards plilipBuilding clear and easy to understand dashboards Tableau and presentations plilipCommunicate findings to all stakeholders pliulpWho you are pbrullip3 years in an analytic role including data and analytics digital marketing growth marketing or consulting  plilipComfortable in SQL and some experience with a programming language Python or R a plus plilipQuantitative and qualitative analysis skills and well versed in financial analysis metrics Return on Investment ROI Margin CAC LTV etc plilipDatabase experience around querying and managing large data sets preferably in LookerTABLEAU or similar Business Intelligence tool plilipGraduate with a Bachelors degree in a related fieldpliul
